welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villalbilla, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to discover the beauty and charm of our city and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, primarily used for long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a code or registration.
